issue: I am getting network connectivity issue
category:
Based on the description "I am getting network connectivity issue", this IT support issue can be classified under the Network category.

Network issues typically involve problems related to the computer's ability to connect to the internet or other networks, such as Wi-Fi connectivity problems, router or modem issues, network cable problems, or issues with network settings or configurations.
